short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Activate this extension to instantly view and download all Facebook ads just with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of missing out on valuable Facebook ads while strolling through your feed? This Facebook Ad Collector chrome extension is your one-stop solution to effortlessly collect and manage Facebook ads as you browse. Take control of your ad discovery experience and make the most of your Facebook feed with this powerful extension. 

  

Key Features: 

>> Automatic Ad Collection: Our extension automatically detects and saves Facebook ads while you browse your news feed, ensuring you never miss out on any ads. 

>> Ad Finder: Easily locate and access all the collected ads in one convenient place, giving you quick and easy access to the content that interests you. 

>> Save or Delete: You have the flexibility to save your favorite ads for later or remove any unwanted ads from your list with a simple click. 

>> Seamless Integration: Enjoy a seamless and hassle-free experience as our extension integrates seamlessly with Facebook, making the ad collection process effortless. 

>> Ongoing Collection: The extension continually collects and stores ads as you browse Facebook, ensuring that your collection stays up to date. 

  

How to Use?  

>> Install the extension 
>> Visit Facebook and log in to your account. 
>> Scroll through your Facebook news feed, and the extension will automatically detect and save ads for you. 
>> Click on the extension icon in your browser to view the collected ads. 
>> A new tab will open with all the collected ad data from Facebook. 
>> You can save your favorite ads for later or delete any unwanted ads from the list.
